 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָחַם‎</span>]<sub>171</sub> **verb** ==fight, do battle== (Late Hebrew Hithpa\`el; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ואלתחם‎</span> [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>11.15.19</sup> perhaps = ***order the battle***, compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl. 1886, 721</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fit close together***, so Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לחם‎</span> Pi\`el, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el ***unite***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fit*** also ***threaten***; [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>Verb. Denom. 59</sup> thinks verb in Hebrew denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְחָמָה‎</span> ***battle-line***, but dubious); — 

**Qal** (poetry) only ***Imperative*** masculine singular and ***Participle active — fight, do battle*** with, rare, only Psalms, apparently later usage: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחַם אֶתלֹֿחֲמָ֑י‎</span> [[Ps.35.1|Ps 35:1]] ***do battle with those battling with me*** (dubious whether <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎את‎</span> is accusative sign compare preposition ***with***, compare [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיבָה אֶתיְֿרִיבַי‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹחֲמִים לִי‎</span> [[Ps.56.3|Ps 56:3]] ***doing battle against me***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹחֵם‎</span> v[[Ps.56.2|Ps 56:2]] as substantive ***fighter.*** **Niph\`al**<sub>167</sub> ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְחַם‎</span> [[Judg.9.17|Judg 9:17]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִלְחַמְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Judg.11.8|Judg 11:8]]; [[1Sam.15.18|1Sam 15:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִלְחַמְנוּ‎</span> [[Deut.1.41|Deut 1:41]] consecutive, etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלָּהֵם‎</span> [[Exod.14.14|Exod 14:14]]; [[Deut.1.30|Deut 1:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלָּ֫חֶם לָ֑נוּ‎</span> [[Neh.4.14|Neh 4:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּלָּ֫חֶם‎</span> [[Exod.17.8|Exod 17:8]] + 19 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלָּחֵם‎</span> [[Zech.14.14|Zech 14:14]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּיִּלָּֽחֲמוּ‎</span> [[Judg.1.5|Judg 1:5]] + 13 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּלָּֽחֲמוּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.109.3|Ps 109:3]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלָּֽחֲמוּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.31|1Kgs 22:31]] + 4 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלָּֽחֲמוּן‎</span> [[1Kgs.12.24|1Kgs 12:24]].; etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלָּחֵם‎</span> [[Exod.17.9|Exod 17:9]]; [[1Sam.18.17|1Sam 18:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלָּ֫חֶם בּוֺ‎</span> [[Judg.9.38|Judg 9:38]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלָּֽחֲמוּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.10.3|2Kgs 10:3]]; [[Neh.4.8|Neh 4:8]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְחֹם‎</span> [[Judg.11.25|Judg 11:25]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלָּחֵם‎</span> [[Judg.1.9|Judg 1:9]] + 35 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלָּ֫חֶם בּוֺ‎</span> etc., [[Num.22.11|Num 22:11]] + 6 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלָּחֲמוֺ‎</span> [[2Kgs.8.29|2Kgs 8:29]] + 3 t.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְחָם‎</span> [[Exod.14.24|Exod 14:24]] + 10 t.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְחָמִים‎</span> [[Josh.10.25|Josh 10:25]] + 10 t. (but [[1Sam.31.1|1Sam 31:1]] read rather <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְחֲמוּ‎</span>, so \|\| [[1Chr.10.1|1Chr 10:1]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]], compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]); — ***engage in battle*** (reciprocal), sometimes ***wage war*** ([[Josh.10.5|Josh 10:5]]; [[Judg.11.5|Judg 11:5]]; [[1Kgs.14.19|1Kgs 14:19]]; [[1Kgs.22.46|1Kgs 22:46]]; [[2Kgs.6.8|2Kgs 6:8]]; [[2Kgs.14.28|2Kgs 14:28]] etc.), often with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of enemy (60 t.) [[Exod.1.10|Exod 1:10]]; [[Exod.17.9|Exod 17:9]]; [[Exod.17.10|Exod 17:10]]; [[Num.21.23|Num 21:23]]; [[Num.21.26|Num 21:26]]; [[Num.22.11|Num 22:11]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.11.8|Judg 11:8]]; [[Judg.11.25|Judg 11:25]]; [[1Sam.15.18|1Sam 15:18]]; [[2Sam.8.10|2Sam 8:10]] + (49 t.); less often with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of city attacked or besieged [[Judg.9.45|Judg 9:45]]; [[1Sam.23.1|1Sam 23:1]]; [[2Sam.12.26|2Sam 12:26]]; [[2Sam.12.27|2Sam 12:27]]; [[2Sam.12.29|2Sam 12:29]]; [[Isa.20.1|Isa 20:1]]; [[Josh.10.31|Josh 10:31]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[1Kgs.20.1|1Kgs 20:1]]; [[Neh.4.2|Neh 4:2]] of tower [[Judg.1.52|Judg 1:52]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאַרְצִי‎</span> [[Judg.11.12|Judg 11:12]]; also with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> of enemy (26 t.): [[Judg.5.20|Judg 5:20]]; [[Judg.11.4|Judg 11:4]]; [[Judg.11.5|Judg 11:5]]; [[Judg.11.20|Judg 11:20]]; [[Josh.11.5|Josh 11:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.13.5|1Sam 13:5]]; [[1Sam.17.19|1Sam 17:19]], also [[1Sam.17.32|1Sam 17:32]]; [[1Sam.17.33|1Sam 17:33]] (of single combat), [[Deut.20.4|Deut 20:4]]; [[Josh.9.2|Josh 9:2]] (both [[BDB#D|D]]), [[2Kgs.13.12|2Kgs 13:12]]; [[2Kgs.14.15|2Kgs 14:15]]; [[2Chr.11.1|2Chr 11:1]]; [[2Chr.17.10|2Chr 17:10]]; [[2Chr.27.5|2Chr 27:5]]; [[Dan.10.20|Dan 10:20]]; [[Dan.11.11|Dan 11:11]] +; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> of city [[Josh.10.29|Josh 10:29]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Josh.19.47|Josh 19:47]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); c <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתֿ‎</span> = ***with***, of enemy, [[Josh.24.8|Josh 24:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.17.9|1Sam 17:9]] (single combat), [[Jer.21.5|Jer 21:5]]; [[1Kgs.20.23|1Kgs 20:23]]; [[2Kgs.19.9|2Kgs 19:9]] = [[Isa.37.9|Isa 37:9]]; [[Jer.37.10|Jer 37:10]] also [[Judg.12.4|Judg 12:4]]; [[2Sam.11.17|2Sam 11:17]]; [[2Sam.21.15|2Sam 21:15]]; [[1Kgs.22.31|1Kgs 22:31]]; [[2Kgs.8.2|2Kgs 8:2]]; [[2Kgs.9.15|2Kgs 9:15]]; [[Jer.21.4|Jer 21:4]]; [[Jer.32.5|Jer 32:5]]; [[Jer.33.5|Jer 33:5]]; [[2Chr.18.30|2Chr 18:30]]; [[2Chr.22.6|2Chr 22:6]], and with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺתָם‎</span> (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִתָּם‎</span>) [[Josh.10.25|Josh 10:25]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[1Kgs.20.25|1Kgs 20:25]] ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Lgb. ii, 296</sup>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִל‎</span>, ***against***, of enemy only [[Jer.21.2|Jer 21:2]] elsewhere (16 t.) of city: [[Josh.10.5|Josh 10:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Isa.7.1|Isa 7:1]]; [[2Kgs.12.18|2Kgs 12:18]]; [[2Kgs.19.8|2Kgs 19:8]] = [[Isa.37.8|Isa 37:8]] especially [[BDB#D|D]] and Je: [[Deut.20.10|Deut 20:10]]; [[Deut.20.19|Deut 20:19]]; [[Josh.10.34|Josh 10:34]]; [[Josh.10.36|Josh 10:36]]; [[Josh.10.38|Josh 10:38]] (all [[BDB#D|D]]), [[Jer.32.24|Jer 32:24]]; [[Jer.32.29|Jer 32:29]]; [[Jer.34.1|Jer 34:1]]; [[Jer.34.7|Jer 34:7]]; [[Jer.34.8|Jer 34:8]]; [[Jer.34.22|Jer 34:22]]; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> of enemy [[Jer.1.19|Jer 1:19]]; [[Jer.15.20|Jer 15:20]]; with suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּלָּֽחֲמוּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.109.3|Ps 109:3]] ***and they have fought against me***; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָ֑חַד‎</span> i.e. fight ***together*** = with (against) one another [[1Sam.17.10|1Sam 17:10]] absolute with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְחָמוֺת‎</span> ***fight battles*** [[1Sam.8.20|1Sam 8:20]]; [[1Sam.18.17|1Sam 18:17]]; [[1Sam.25.28|1Sam 25:28]]; [[2Chr.32.8|2Chr 32:8]]; absolute elsewhere [[Judg.5.19|Judg 5:19]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.5.20|Judg 5:20]]; [[Deut.1.41|Deut 1:41]]; [[Zech.10.5|Zech 10:5]] + 26 t. + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּסֻרוּ עָלָיו לְהִלָּחֵ֑ם‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.32|1Kgs 22:32]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***for, in behalf of***, [[Judg.9.17|Judg 9:17]]; [[2Kgs.10.3|2Kgs 10:3]]; [[Neh.4.8|Neh 4:8]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> = ***id***., [[Exod.14.14|Exod 14:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), v[[Exod.14.25|Exod 14:25]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of enemy), [[Deut.1.30|Deut 1:30]]; [[Deut.3.22|Deut 3:22]]; [[Deut.20.4|Deut 20:4]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> of enemy, see above), [[Josh.10.14|Josh 10:14]]; [[Josh.10.42|Josh 10:42]]; [[Josh.23.3|Josh 23:3]]; [[Josh.23.10|Josh 23:10]] (all [[BDB#D|D]]), [[Neh.4.14|Neh 4:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָכֹל לְהִלּ‎</span> ***be able to fight***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎את‎</span> of enemy [[1Sam.17.9|1Sam 17:9]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of enemy [[Num.22.11|Num 22:11]], = ***be successful in fighting***, prevail against; so with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of city [[Isa.7.1|Isa 7:1]], and absolute [[2Kgs.16.5|2Kgs 16:5]] (after <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּצֻרוּ עָל‎</span> ***besiege***). 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָחַם‎</span>] **verb** ==use as food, eat==, poetic (so [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]], compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>30</sup> [[BDB#Guidi|Guidi]]<sup>Della Sede 33</sup>; this would explain different between <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם‎</span> and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; yet verb rare and chiefly late); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָֽחֲמוּ‎</span> [[Prov.4.17|Prov 4:17]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלְחַם‎</span> [[Prov.23.6|Prov 23:6]], 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלְחַם‎</span> [[Ps.141.4|Ps 141:4]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַחֲמוּ‎</span> [[Prov.9.5|Prov 9:5]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחוֺם‎</span> [[Prov.23.1|Prov 23:1]] ***Passive participle*** plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחֻמֵי‎</span> [[Deut.32.24|Deut 32:24]] ***eat*** (mostly Proverbs), absolute [[Prov.23.1|Prov 23:1]] followed by accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם‎</span> [[Prov.4.17|Prov 4:17]]; [[Prov.23.6|Prov 23:6]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּלַחְמִי‎</span> [[Prov.9.5|Prov 9:5]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמַנְעַמֵּיהֶם‎</span> [[Ps.141.4|Ps 141:4]] ***eat of their dainties***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחֻמֵי רֶשֶׁף‎</span> [[Deut.32.24|Deut 32:24]] (poem) ***eaten up with the Fire-bolt***, figurative of pestilence ([[BDB#Dr|Dr]]).
